Work with Tricia

You, my friend, have come to the right place. Let's change your life for the better.

Here you can talk about how your prospective client will benefit from working with you and just how much you understand and can related to their pain point.

Conscious Uncoupling

5 Steps To Living Happily Even After
A powerful 10-Week Course, the 5-Steps of Conscious Uncoupling, offers you the roadmap for how to turn the pain of your breakup into a genuine opportunity to recreate your life in a bigger and better way. This deeply personal approach will guide you through the devastating storm of the loss of love to finding emotional freedom, reclaiming your power and finally to getting your life back on track!!

Take a peek inside...

the goods
Step 1

Finding Emotional Freedom

Find the emotional space to move beyond the old painful patterns in love and use this shattering to radically evolve how you live and how you love.

Step 2

Reclaim Your Power And Your Life

Let go of being a wounded victim of love shifting your perspective away from blame to taking full responsibility for your part in what happened.

Step 3

Break The Pattern

Finally understand and break free of the painful experiences that have been at the heart of the repetitive patterns in your relationships and give yourself the opportunity to evolve beyond them.

Step 4

Become A Love Alchemist

Begin to make choices and take actions that graduate you from the painful patterns of the past. Radically transform the dynamics between you and your former partner allowing for the possible emergence of a healthy new form the relationship has the potential to take.

Step 5

Create Your Happily Even After Life

Get the support you will need to make wise, healthy and life-affirming decisions as you take on the essential tasks of reinventing your life. Set up the vital new structures that will ensure that the new life you’re embracing will be greater than the one you are letting go of.

Mindset & confidence coaching for women who are looking to create the life of their dreams.

Tricia Rago
